      • writeOnBoard

        @POST
 @Path(value="writeOnBoard")
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public void writeOnBoard(@FormParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                     @FormParam(value="message")
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String message,
                                                                                                                     @FormParam(value="group")
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String group)
                                                                                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Allow a user to write on board. This function is called when we need to store a new message from the user into the database "writes" on the board of the group
        Parameters:
        message - the message which will be posted on the board
        group - the group with the required board
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        Since:
        1.0
